description: This file defines the 'Alerts' page component using React, which displays a filterable list of alerts with real-time WebSocket updates, including UI controls for filtering and acknowledging alerts.

methods.name: Alerts()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the alerts page with filters, live updates, and alert list.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch and normalize alert data based on current filters.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates filter state based on input changes.

methods.name: handleAck
methods.description: Acknowledges an alert by ID via API call and updates local state.

methods.name: toLocalInput
methods.description: Converts ISO date string to local datetime-local input format.
